intro.heading: Chantelle & Paul
intro.text:
Paul and Chantelle are getting married 
 and you are invited to witness & celebrate with them on this special day

details.heading: The Details
details.text:
Below you can find a quick overview of our special day, 
 with more detailed information regarding the itinerary, transport & parking, gifting & location further down

when.heading: The When
when.text: Below you can find a timeline of how our special day will proceed

where.heading: The Where
where.text: Below you can find the locations of the ceremony, the lunch & the bonfire evening

rsvp.heading: The RSVP
rsvp.text: Please RSVP by Sunday, 13/12/2020. Guest must please RSVP for the ceremony and lunch, as well as the bonfire.
